divs: Sighting DetailsAll sightings seen at my house in the outskirts of town of Tucson.AZ. I started looking towards the west side of Tucson mountains,after my nabber told me and my child's mother ,about strange lights towards mountain range.sins then i had several experiences with strange and unusual phenomenon .I am at a friends using his computer ,so I don't have my note pad with me were i got time and dates recorded . What can tell you is that iv e witnessed blue orbs floating and multiplying ,orange glowing spheres with black corers hovering over the mountains orange lights faded into the black cores then flew off. I must speak with some one from mufon.
Summary: cloaked almost invisible looked like a bird or butterfly flickering around size 3 houses
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around July 10th 2008
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
